name: The Usher Foundation XI: The Lonely
name_original: The Usher Foundation XI: The Lonely
description:
A fan game for Rusty Quill's The Magnus Archives podcast.

You're stuck in a fire lookout tower 10,000 feet above sea level, but at least you can see the next lookout over. 

Full-screen button is on the bottom right. This game uses audio, which can be toggled on/off via the popout menu on the bottom left. The Magnus Archives is my favorite podcast, so I thought it would be cool to make a short fan game or two. Also a good excuse to explore more form stuff with Twine!
